name: todoist_scrape_inbox
description: Scrape the Todoist inbox. Returns all inbox tasks with titles, due dates, and priorities. Requires login.

steps.code: const tasks = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.task_list_item, [class*="task_list_item"], [data-testid="task"]')).slice(0,50).map(el => { const title = el.querySelector('.task_content, [class*="task_content"], [data-testid="task-name"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const due = el.querySelector('.date, [class*="due_date"], time')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const priority = el.querySelector('[class*="priority"]')?.className?.match(/priority_(\d)/)?.[1]||''; const labels = Array.from(el.querySelectorAll('[class*="label"], .tag')).map(l=>l.textContent.trim()); return { title, due_date: due, priority, labels }; }).filter(t=>t.title); return { project: 'Inbox', tasks }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
